src:
Ragam Musisi Rayakan Ultah ke-20 Mocca di Album Tribute
02 Nov 2019, 02:55 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Mocca bakal merilis album tribut 'You and Me Against the World: A Tribute To Mocca' sebagai perayaan ulang tahun ke-20 di bulan ini. (dok. Mocca)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Setiap band memiliki cara sendiri untuk merayakan ulang tahun. Band Mocca yang bulan ini merayakan kebersamaan selama 20 tahun merilis album tribut bertajuk You and Me Against the World: A Tribute To Mocca.Album itu berisikan sembilan penampil berbeda yang menyanyikan lagu-lagu Mocca. Coldiac membawakan On the Night Like This, Asteriska dengan My Only One, Bilal Indrajaya dengan Object of My Affection dan Kelas Mocca melantunkan Do What You Wanna Do.Kemudian NonaRia menyanyikan Teman Sejati, Sky Sucahyo membawakan Secret Admirer serta What If, Mustache and Beard mendendangkan Ketika Semua Telah Berakhir, Mardial dengan Lucky Man dan The Panturas membawakan You and Me Against The World.Setiap lagu dibawakan menurut genre yang diusung masing-masing penampil. Seperti The Panturas yang membawakan lagu You and Me Against The World dengan aransemen surf rock, terasa dari suara gitar yang terdengar 'becek' karena efek revrerb.



Setiap lagu langsung dipilih oleh band atau solois yang sudah ditentukan Mocca. Selama proses pengerjaan, para penampil tetap berdiskusi dengan Mocca, meski keputusan terakhir berada di tangan band dan solois."Menurut Riko Prayitno (gitaris Mocca), ada beberapa pertimbangan saat menentukan band dan penyanyi terlibat. Salah satunya adalah musisi pendatang baru tapi sudah punya karya," dikutip dari siaran pers yang diterima CNNIndonesia.com.Sampai saat ini baru lagu You and Me Against The World yang dirilis melalui kanal YouTube Lucky Me Music. Lucky Me Music terlibat sebagai label rekaman. Album sudah dirilis dalam format cakram padat atau compact disc (CD) mulai hari ini (1/11). Sementara penikmat digital baru bisa mendengar You and Me Against the World: A Tribute To Mocca pada 22 November mendatang. (adp/rea)
text:
Variety of Musicians Celebrate Mocca's 20th Anniversary on Album Tribute
02 Nov 2019, 02:55 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Mocca will release the tribute album 'You and Me Against the World: A Tribute to Mocca' as a 20th birthday celebration this month. (doc. Mocca)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - Each band has its own way to celebrate birthdays. The Mocca band, which this month celebrated together for 20 years, released a tribute album titled You and Me Against the World: A Tribute to Mocca. The album contained nine different performers singing Mocca songs. Coldiac delivered On the Night Like This, Asteriska with My Only One, Bilal Indrajaya with Object of My Affection and Mocca Class sang Do What You Wanna Do. When All Is Over, Mardial with Lucky Man and The Panturas bring You and Me Against The World. Each song is sung according to the genre that each performer carries. Like The Panturas who performed You and Me Against The World with surf rock arrangements, it was felt from the guitar sound that sounded 'muddy' because of the revrerb effect.



Each song is directly chosen by a band or soloist who has been determined by Mocca. During the process, the performers continued to discuss with Mocca, even though the final decision was in the hands of the band and soloists. "According to Riko Prayitno (Mocca guitarist), there were several considerations when determining the band and singer involved. , "quoted from a press release received by CNNIndonesia.com. Until now only the song You and Me Against The World was released through the Lucky Me Music YouTube channel. Lucky Me Music was involved as a record label. The album has been released in the format of solid discs or compact discs (CD) starting today (1/11). While new digital connoisseurs can hear You and Me Against the World: A Tribute to Mocca on 22 November. (adp / rea)
